title: EQUALS_IGNORE_CASE
description: Returns TRUE if the provided string exactly matches any of the specified compare_strings, ignoring case sensitivity. Otherwise, returns FALSE.

parameters.name: â€¦ compare_strings
parameters.description: One or more strings to compare against the source string, ignoring case sensitivity.

examples:
EQUALS_IGNORE_CASE("Open", "open", "closed")
-- Returns TRUE because case is ignored and "Open" matches "open".

EQUALS_IGNORE_CASE(Status, "in progress", "completed")
-- Returns TRUE if Status matches either string, ignoring case; otherwise, returns FALSE.
